channel.title: XN - Duality EP [Dubstep, Riddim, Garageband]
channel.description:
I did it. Made and released my first EP. :tada::tada::tada: https://soundcloud.com/m_x_c_n/sets/duality-ep
It's 4 tracks, 2 of which are older and the other two are newer (hence the title: Duality), but they all focus on Dubstep/Riddim. Tho you might need to turn up your volume when listening b/c sc keeps goofin up the volume on upload
.
Feedback is always appreciated
Oh and shoutout to @Cornea. Borrowed a few of your samples for one of the tracks (Airstrike)
